mapper.insert: insert into app_pay_config (app_pay_config_id, app_id, pay_platform, created_time, updated_time) values (#{appPayConfigId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payPlatform,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select app_pay_config_id, app_id, pay_platform, created_time, updated_time from app_pay_config
